version_description:
We’re still working out a few kinks with our new app. We appreciate the feedback we’ve received from you to help us improve. Here’s what’s in this update:
• Fixed: Some delivery customers weren’t able to reserve a delivery time.
• Fixed: Some stores incorrectly showed that they didn’t offer curbside.
• Improvement: Stability updates

We’re still working out a few kinks with our new app. We appreciate the feedback we’ve received from you to help us improve. Here’s what’s in this update:
• Fixed: Some delivery customers weren’t able to reserve a delivery time.
• Fixed: Some stores incorrectly showed that they didn’t offer curbside.
• Improvement: Stability updates

We appreciate all the feedback we’ve received and are actively working to improve your experience. Here are a few more changes coming your way:
• Improvement: We know shopping lists are important to you. We’re working hard to get a new version into your app. Until then, your app will now redirect you to your mobile browser to access all your lists.
• Fixed: Some delivery customers weren’t able to reserve a delivery time.
• Fixed: Some stores incorrectly showed that they didn’t offer curbside.
• Improvement: Stability improvements

We appreciate all the feedback we’ve received and are actively working to improve your experience. Here are a few more changes coming your way:
• Improvement: We know shopping lists are important to you. We’re working hard to get a new version into your app. Until then, your app will now redirect you to your mobile browser to access all your lists.
• Fixed: Some delivery customers weren’t able to reserve a delivery time.
• Fixed: Some stores incorrectly showed that they didn’t offer curbside.
• Improvement: Stability improvements

Thank you for shopping H-E-B and using our app! We update our app regularly to give you the best experience. In this release, we’ve made improvements to how you redeem coupons. Here are the changes coming your way:

Improvement: We adjusted how our digital coupons display for easier scanning in-store.

Fixed: Some customers were having an issue while viewing coupon details.

Improvement: Added category filters to coupons.

Improvement: Made how to redeem coupons clearer.

Improvement: Streamlined the password reset process.

Fixed: Customers couldn’t have an apostrophe in their account name.

Thank you for shopping H-E-B and using our app! We update our app regularly to give you the best experience. In this release, we’ve made improvements to how you redeem coupons. Here are the changes coming your way:

Improvement: We adjusted how our digital coupons display for easier scanning in-store.

Fixed: Some customers were having an issue while viewing coupon details.

Improvement: Added category filters to coupons.

Improvement: Made how to redeem coupons clearer.

Improvement: Streamlined the password reset process.

Fixed: Customers couldn’t have an apostrophe in their account name.

Thanks for shopping H-E-B! We update our app regularly to give you the best experience. In this release, we’ve made it easier to find items in your store, streamlined the process for adding an address, and added a quick way to access the Pharmacy app. We also fixed a handful of bugs, and are hard at work on shopping lists.

Thanks for shopping H-E-B! We update our app regularly to give you the best experience. In this release, we’ve made it easier to find items in your store, streamlined the process for adding an address, and added a quick way to access the Pharmacy app. We also fixed a handful of bugs, and are hard at work on shopping lists.

Thanks for shopping H-E-B! We update our app regularly to give you the best experience. In this release, we’ve given you the option to add on any forgotten items to your order up to 4 hours before your scheduled delivery or pickup time. We also fixed a handful of bugs, and continue to work on shopping lists.

Thanks for shopping H-E-B! We update our app regularly to give you the best experience. In this release, we’ve given you the option to add on any forgotten items to your order up to 4 hours before your scheduled delivery or pickup time. We also fixed a handful of bugs, and continue to work on shopping lists.

You asked, we listened! In this release, we’ve added shopping lists! You can now make a list for any occasion and check items off as you shop. Your shopping lists will show an item’s in-store location, and can be easily added to your cart. We’ve made it easier to find items in your store and also fixed a few bugs.

Your shopping lists will show an item’s in-store location, and can be easily added to your cart. We’ve made it easier to find items in your store and also fixed a few bugs.

In this minor release we fixed a problem in which a product with no aisle information would display an error.

We fixed a few more lingering bugs.

You asked, we listened! In this release, we’ve added shopping lists! You can now make a list for any occasion and check items off as you shop. Your shopping lists will show an item’s in-store location, and can be easily added to your cart. We’ve made it easier to find items in your store.

We fixed a few bugs:
- The coupon clipping process in guest mode no longer returns an error
- You’ll now see a notification when a curbside or delivery time slot becomes unavailable
- You won’t see any more truncated coupon descriptions
- Clearing a search term will now always clear the search results

Drum roll, please! For our latest release, we’ve added the ability to sort shopping lists by aisle - no more wandering the store to check off your list! We’ve also added a receipt scanning feature to let you quickly add previously purchased items to a shopping list, and are hard at work on other shopping list improvements.

We’ve also added a receipt scanning feature to let you quickly add previously purchased items to a shopping list, and are hard at work on other shopping list improvements.

In 1.5.1 we fixed a crash that would sometimes show up when choosing "View All"

Thanks for shopping H-E-B! We update our app regularly to give you the best experience. In this release, we’ve made improvements to our product locator to help you find your groceries faster. We also fixed a few bugs.

Thanks for shopping H-E-B. In this release, we’ve made some changes to our ordering process to ensure all Texans have access to the food and household items they need. We also fixed a few bugs.

Thanks for shopping H-E-B. In this release, we made it easier for you to save by highlighting weekly ad deals. Just look for the red banners! We also fixed a few bugs.

Thanks for shopping H-E-B. In this release, we've introduced a new way to save with the My H-E-B app — in select stores, you can now scan H-E-B yellow coupons in store and redeem savings at the register.
